properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000119 Merrimac St, Boston, MA

properties.name: AMO
properties.description: Posted by Bianca200018 Trescott Street, Taunton 02780gay bar & club in Taunton open 7 days per week from 6PM to 2AM. Located upstairs from Boomerangz. Special events include sex-toy-parties, single-mingle, and drag shows! cover on Fridays and Saturdays only! (18 plus)

properties.name: Axis--Mondays only
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000   13 Lansdowne St, Boston, 02215Days: Mondays only! Hours: 10 p.m. - 2 a.m. With a young crowd and consistently great music, Axis is the only show in town on Mondays. Enjoy the drag show! The night is 19+. (edgeboston.com)

properties.name: Bobby's Place
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000 60 Weir Street, Taunton 02780 Days: 7 Days a Week Hours: 5PM-2AM

properties.name: Chaps
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000  101 Warrenton St, Boston, MADays: All Hours: Noon - 2am. Chaps has two rooms, a medium-sized dance floor with multiple platforms, three bars, and great music. The floor gets dark and crowded during peak hours, particularly on weekends. A seating area and pool table can be found towards the back.The clientele varies depending on the time of day, but for nights dancing usually features a young, multi-ethnic, predominantly gay crowd. Sunday T-dance here is the most populous in the city. (edgeboston.com)

properties.name: Charlotte's Web
properties.description: Posted by Bdolan20001193 Enterprise Dr, port charlotte flGo past the wallmart and take a left into the industrial park. Look for the christmas lights on the split rail fence, and you\'ll find charlotte\'s web in the last warehouse unit on the right behind a garage door big enough to drive an RV through. Mondays are karaoke -- look out for the ringers, you\'ll be facing some tough competition.

properties.name: Club Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000  209 Columbus Ave, Boston, MANightclub, video bar, restaurant. Mixed.

properties.name: Eagle
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000 520 Tremont Street, Boston, MADays: All Hours: 3pm-2am, from noon on Sundays Description: The Eagle is one of Boston\'s premiere cruise bars, featuring a neighborhood crowd. A friendly place to meet a new face and maybe play some pool with some regulars. (edgeboston.com)

properties.name: Fox Bar
properties.description: Posted by Bdolan2000 7520 Shawnee Mission Pkwy, Overland Park, KSThe only gay bar in the Kansas part of Kansas City -- the remaining 20-odd bars are all across the State line in Missouri. It\'s easy to miss the fox: the sign is tiny, the windows are dark, and it\'s in a strip mall next to an insurance company. A sign outside says \'private club for members only\'. Inside on a recent wednesday, the winter olympics were playing on tv, a mixed crowd played pool and drank .50 drafts, and a karaoke contest was gearing up.

properties.name: Friend's Landing
properties.description: Posted by Bianca200085 Water Street, Haverhill, MAThe "north of the city" favorite. Bar and Dance Club. (edgeboston.com)

properties.name: Fritz
properties.description: Posted by Bianca200026 Chandler Street, Boston, MADays: All Hours: Noon-2am Description: Fritz has been described as "Boston\'s gay Cheers," and lives up to that reputation. The mood is cheerful, with bright lighting and a neighborhood feel. The crowd is predominantly male, with a heavy emphasis on locals. (edgeboston.com) As close to a gay sports bar as Boston gets, the crowd here runs the gamut in the age, shapes and size categories. Brunch is served on Sundays. The friendly bar staff makes this sort of like a gay Cheers, it seems everybody knows your name. No cover, open noon to 2am. (bobmeyers.com)

properties.name: Gay Dallas at Cedar Springs
properties.description: Posted by Snowboard9 This is Dallas\'s gaybourhood. See my maps for more information and welcome to Dallas !

properties.name: Jacque's
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000 79 Broadway, Boston, MADays: All Hours: 11am to Midnight Description: Although drag queens may be found in various clubs around Boston, Jacques is really the only place to see a drag *show*. It\'s not the most attractive place around, however. The crowd tends to be heavy on transvestites and transexuals, and somewhat older. Monday: Cabaret drag Tuesday: Miss Kris Thursday: Miss Kris Friday: Divas and Live Music Saturday: Divas and Live Music Sunday: Drag-on Showgirls (edgeboston.com)

properties.name: Machine
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000  1256 Boylston St., Boston, MADays: Thursday - Sunday Description: Great dance club with quiet area for chatting and pool tables plus several bars and a huge main dance floor. It is connected to a leather bar called Ramrod but the two crowds only really mix in the pool bar, which is a great place to hang out and meet people. Cute bartenders and boxes for those who wants to get up and dance. This is by far the most happening place in Boston for dancing on friday nights! Resident DJ/producer Darrin Friedman is also the guy behind hitmakers Decibel, who are signed to Peter Rauhofer\'s label. The night features VJ Tom Yaz and his "Non-stop Exotic Video Show" in the pool room. Tuesday: Service Industry Night Thursday: Karaoke Competition Friday: Darrin Friedman in the main room and VJ Tom Yaz\'s Non-Stop Exotic Video Show in the pool room. Saturday: Brazilian Night (edgeboston.com)

properties.name: Manray
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000 21 Brookline Street, Cambridge, MACurrently closed, but sponsoring gay-friendly events. See their site. I used to dance to Nine Inch Nails here when I was in college.

properties.name: Paradise
properties.description: Posted by Bdolan2000

properties.name: Puzzles
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000428 North Front Street, New Bedford 02746 New Bedford\'s only Gay & Lesbian bar. (edgeboston.com)

properties.name: Ramrod
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000  1254 Boylston St, Boston, MAWhere men meet men.

properties.name: Randolph Country Club
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000   44 Mazzeo Drive, Randolph 02368Randolph Country Club established itself as a complete entertainment complex serving the Gay and Lesbian Community in the late 60\'s. We feature two dance clubs and a Member\'s Lounge. In season we have the original Olympic Size Swimming Pool. Also available for your convenience we offer the sun deck, volleyball court, waiter service and the outdoor poolside bar and grill. During the less than perfect warm summer days we offer a fireplace, candlelight dinners, and a friendly atmosphere to make waiting for more perfect weather more enjoyable. We are open 7 days a week, 365 days per year and there is always something going on for everyone. During the summer, we open at 10AM seven days a week. During the winter, we open at 2PM Monday through Friday and 12 Noon on Saturday and Sunday. We are open until 2AM all year.

properties.name: Rise
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000  306 Stuart Street, Boston 02116 Days: Fridays thru Sundays only Hours: Usually 1:30am to 6:00am Description: Rise is IT for Boston after-hours. Beantown rolls up the sidewalks at 2 a.m. (depressing), so thank the heavens for this place. It’s a membership club, which means you have to find someone to sponsor you in the door, and there are no markings or signs for it at all. It’s the best kept secret here, and many of the boys want it to stay that way. So if you’re looking to get in, your best bet is to go out to Machine, BUZZ, or Avalon and find someone who is headed to Rise. Then beg them to sponsor you in. The club regularly features such marquee talent as Chus & Ceballos, Roger Sanchez, Richie Ladue, and more. Once you get in, you’ll find the hottest late-night party in the smallest little venue you can imagine. The first floor is a lounge (without a real bar, since Rise doesn’t serve alcohol thanks to city ordinances), and the second is the pulsing, raving dance floor. The party goes all night at Rise! The most crowded nights are when a hot DJ is in town, usually on Saturdays.

properties.name: The Alley
properties.description: Posted by Bianca200014 Pi Alley, Boston 02116Levi/leather bar in Downtown Crossing. It\'s cruisy, but it gets a friendly afternoon cocktail crowd. (edgeboston.com)
